Constructs a new empty TextArea with the specified number of rows and columns. Uses a default scrollbar policy.

rows - is an integer specifying the number of visible rows for this TextArea component.
cols - is an integer specifying the number of visible cols for this TextArea component.

FormTextArea

public FormTextArea(java.lang.String text,
                    int rows,
                    int cols,
                    int scrollbars)
Constructs a new TextArea component initialized with the specified text, specified number of rows and columns and the specified scrollbar policy.
Parameters:
text:Ljava.lang.String - object used to set the content of this TextArea component.
rows - is an integer specifying the number of visible rows for this TextArea component.
cols - is an integer specifying the number of visible cols for this TextArea component.
scrollbars - is an integer value specifying the scrollbar policy put into effect.
